long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple tool to manage Elastic Search Indices. It is specially created to support Elastic Search Version 5 and above but can be used to manage older versions also.

Key Features are :

* Can see the list of all indices.
* Can create/delete indices
* Can Re-Index data
* Can see stats
* Can Search Data
* Can Run Custom Query
* Can Analyze Data
* Can see templates
* Can update settings
* Can manage aliases
* Can close/start indices
